statements: SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT product_name, quantity_sold FROM sales_data WHERE revenue > 1000;
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity_sold, revenue FROM sales_data ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, quantity_sold FROM sales_data WHERE quantity_sold > 50 ORDER BY quantity_sold DESC;
SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity_sold) AS total_sold FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_name;
SELECT product_name, revenue FROM sales_data WHERE quantity_sold > 10 ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE revenue BETWEEN 1000 AND 2000 ORDER BY product_id;
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity_sold FROM sales_data WHERE product_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, revenue FROM sales_data WHERE quantity_sold < 5 AND revenue > 500 ORDER BY product_name ASC, revenue DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity_sold, revenue FROM sales_data WHERE revenue IS NOT NULL ORDER BY quantity_sold ASC, revenue DESC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT product_name, category FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT sale_date, quantity, total_amount FROM sales WHERE quantity >= 10 AND total_amount < 100;
SELECT p.product_name, s.quantity, s.total_amount FROM products p JOIN sales s ON p.product_id = s.product_id;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 1000 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM sales GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_quantity > 50;
SELECT p.product_name, s.sale_date, s.quantity FROM products p JOIN sales s ON p.product_id = s.product_id WHERE s.sale_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT category, AVG(price) AS average_price FROM products GROUP BY category ORDER BY average_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM Sales LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM Sales WHERE sale_amount > 100;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM Products WHERE price < 50;
SELECT product_name, brand, category FROM Products ORDER BY brand DESC;
SELECT trend_name, trend_description, trend_date FROM Trends WHERE trend_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY trend_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Sales WHERE sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, brand, category FROM Products WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM Trends WHERE trend_date >= '2022-01-01' AND trend_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY trend_date ASC;
SELECT s.product_name, p.brand, s.sale_amount FROM Sales s JOIN Products p ON s.product_id = p.product_id WHERE s.sale_amount > 500 ORDER BY s.sale_amount DESC;
SELECT p.*, t.trend_name FROM Products p JOIN Trends t ON p.product_name = t.trend_name WHERE p.category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY p.price ASC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE quantity > 10
SELECT category, COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM products GROUP BY category
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card'
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%' OR phone_number LIKE '%123%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_category FROM Products WHERE stock_quantity > 0;
SELECT AVG(price) AS average_price, MAX(price) AS max_price FROM Products;
SELECT category_name, COUNT(*) AS product_count FROM Categories JOIN Products ON Categories.category_id = Products.product_category GROUP BY category_name;
SELECT * FROM Products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY product_name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products JOIN Categories ON Products.product_category = Categories.category_name WHERE Categories.category_name = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT customer_name, email, address FROM Customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY customer_name LIMIT 20
SELECT product_name, stock_quantity, price FROM Products WHERE stock_quantity < 50 AND price BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT Orders.order_id, Customers.customer_name, Products.product_name, Orders.order_date, Orders.quantity, Orders.total_price FROM Orders JOIN Customers ON Orders.customer_id = Customers.customer_id JOIN Products ON Orders.product_id = Products.product_id WHERE Customers.customer_id = 1001 ORDER BY Orders.order_date DESC LIMIT 5
